text: Reto von Arx (born 13 September, 1976 in Egerkingen, Switzerland) is a Swiss professional ice hockey left winger that currently plays for the HC Davos of the Swiss National League A. von Arx also played in the NHL for 1 season with the Chicago Blackhawks and also for their farm team at the time, the Norfolk Admirals. He was drafted by the Chicago Blackhawks with the 271st overall pick in the 2000 NHL Draft. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Norfolk Admirals players Category:Swiss ice hockey players Category:People from Biel/Bienne
title: Reto von Arx
